title: The Last Goodbye
description: When Jack met Jess it was love at first sight. They had their entire lives ahead of them, but it all came crashing down the day he died. And thatâ€™s where their story begins.Eight years have passed and Jess is a shell of the woman she once was. For Jack, now her Guardian Angel, it is more than he can bear. Breaking divine law, Jack returns to Earth, possessing the body of a comatose man, to help Jess heal and move on with her life. However, Jess begins to fall for this familiar stranger, not realizing that it is her soulmate. But Jack has bigger problems: Because of his actions, the Gates of Heaven have closed. No souls can cross over until he returns. They remain trapped on Earth, in limbo. Will Jack return to Heaven to set things right, or will he choose to stay on Earth with Jess? With existence hanging in the balance, is he ready for the Last Goodbye?
author: Keith  Burke
